title: Ep. 559 - Get Up
description:
Chuck and Nancy solve racism by wearing African scarves, most everyone kneels against the U.S., the Minneapolis City Council president tells her constituents to give up the "privilege" of 911, and the "experts" get coronavirus wrong again.

If you like The Michael Knowles Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: KNOWLES and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/knowles
